metadata.synopsis: Dialog with a prison guard in Wyrm Rock Fortress. Male human patrolling the prison. All about duty and honour.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on |Prison Guard 003| - S_WYR_WyrmRockPrison_Guard_003 - cbf95410-351a-491e-92aa-1663df98c6f5 - (60 10 -731) (he is patrolling the prison)

0.speaker: Fist Ivarus
0.text: Lord Gortash is dead and life has no more meaning, so I don't care what you do. Just don't do it in front of me.

1.speaker: Fist Ivarus
1.text: Carry on. My duty is to my Lord.

2.speaker: Fist Ivarus
2.text: On your way. May Lord Gortash provide.
